name: riff
content:
riff noun [C]
(REPEATED TUNE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in jazz or popular music, a tune that continues or appears regularly in a piece of music while other parts change or are added: The song is punctuated by long guitar riffs.

riff noun [C]
(DIFFERENCE)
something that is slightly different to the usual form: Pistachio-parmesan truffles are a fun riff on those nut-covered cheese balls your mum used to make. His ingenious riff on the original script delights and provokes.

riff verb [I]
(PLAY MUSIC)
in jazz or popular music, to play a short, repeated series of notes : The singer growled over acoustic guitar while his bandmates riffed on banjo, ukulele, and fiddle.

riff verb [I]
(SPEAK)
